nodes.label: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
A land habitat with a tree and a squirrel
A water habitat indicated with blue wavy lines
Correctly identifies and labels a tree and a squirrel in a land habitat
Attempts to illustrate a water habitat but lacks detailed elements
Omitting other living things and details such as the ant and water-specific creatures
Consider adding more living organisms, like fish in the pond and more plants around the tree.
